name: Escape From Violet Institute
description:
Escape From V.I. is a 2D sidescrolling 1st Person Survival Horror game.

You wake up abruptly to the sound of an earthquake ripping through your workplace.
Whilst trying to escape to the surface, the player will find themselves fighting for their life.
Surviving through countless monsters across multiple dimensions, the player will discover the truth about their own past.

The player only has 1 life with no checkpoints or autosaves (A save is made upon quitting to the main menu)
There are branching paths within the game, meaning the choices the player makes, affect the ending they get.

There are plans for new modes and DLC to be added to the game in the near future.
